alert.note: Alert for South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:20PM AKST until January 30 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 55 below occuring. Snow, and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches by Monday Evening. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range
